definition: to turn up without being invited/unsolicited
(negative prefix)/not/no
to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request
self/oneself/from/since/naturally/surely
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: Ask workers to help pick up unsolicited flyers left on your doorstep.
sentences.chinese: 请工人们帮忙捡起门口阶梯上不请自来的传单。

sentences.english: Both friendship and material benefits may well come to you at this time.
sentences.chinese: 友谊和物质利益可能会同时不请自来哟。

sentences.english: Many of those who joined in it, uninvited, we did not even know.
sentences.chinese: 许多不请自来的参加者，我们连认都不认得。

sentences.english: You can worry about their manners at showing up uninvited later.
sentences.chinese: 你可以过会儿再为他们不请自来的行为操心。

sentences.english: Tom crashed the gate and ate like a horse.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆不请自来，擅自闯进来大吃一餐。

sentences.english: Man A: Aren't you worried it might get gatecrashed?
sentences.chinese: 会担心有人不请自来吗？

sentences.english: Then love may come unasked, when you are not seeking it.
sentences.chinese: 那样，当你停止追寻时，爱也许会不请自来。

sentences.english: Here the actor is the intruder.
sentences.chinese: 在这里，演员去不请自来。

sentences.english: Then she's inviting herself to dinner three times a week.
sentences.chinese: 然后就是一周三次不请自来地蹭饭。

definition: to visit sb at home
uninvited or unexpected guest
we are honored by your presence
to come to sb's door/to call on sb
from the beginning/always/to come of one's own accord
to grace sb with one's presence/your arrival (honorific)/your esteemed presence
to attract/to incur
ill luck/misfortune
lit. One doesn't visit a temple without a cause. (idiom)/fig. to visit sb with an ulterior motive (esp. to ask for sth)/having a hidden agenda
pinyin: wu2 shi4 bu4 deng1 san1 bao3 dian4

definition: god of wealth/very wealthy man
beaming/radiant with happiness
to disturb/to look for trouble/to stir up a row/to bother sb intentionally
Your presence brings light to my humble dwelling/see also 蓬蓽生光|蓬荜生光[peng2 bi4 sheng1 guang1]
infrequent visitor
guest
(polite) excuse me for not going out to meet you
